I teach several courses at the undergraduate and graduate level. Please contact me for more information on any of these courses

-   Elections and Participation (undergraduate)

-   Psychology and Politics (undergraduate)

-   Data Science for Political Science (undergraduate)

-   Maximum Likelihood Estimation (doctoral)

-   Experimental Methods (doctoral)

I have also helped organize and instruct during the Rutgers Summer Institutes in Computational Social Science, held from 2020-2022. If you would like to help organize or provide a guest talk at [SICSS-Rutgers](https://sicss.io/2022/rutgers/) in a future year, please contact me.
